thread.title: VIDEO: Stephen Curry hit a half-court shot against the Clippers
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Stephen Curry hit a half-court shot against the Clippers - Business Insider

author: Cork Gaines
title: VIDEO: Stephen Curry hit a half-court shot against the Clippers

organizations.name: nba stephen curry golden state warriors

text:
ABC
Stephen Curry did it again!
With the Golden State Warriors already up by 18 heading into the half against the Los Angeles Clippers, Curry unleashed a shot from beyond half court and nailed it.
Swoosh!
According to ESPN, the shot was officially registered at 51 feet, Curry's longest shot of the year.
Both Draymond Green and Kevin Durant seemingly knew it was going in before it hit the net.
ABC
Here is the replay.
